Plumbing Source Documentation

1.0001

The Plumbing Source Documentation consists of documentation for a set of applications and the AIS Library which includes a set of classes used by these applications. The AIS Library is further subdivided into sub-libraries, one for each category of classes, such as basic classes and the GUI-dependent classes. These categories are patterned after the categories adopted by Trolltech in their QT library.

  • Plumbing Applications
  • AIS Library Source Documentation

Plumbing Applications

Currently, plumbing holds several applications divided into the following categories:
  • Global Search and Replace Applications
  • Other Applications

Global Search and Replace Applications

The global search-and-replace applications allow the user to search a set of text files in a subtree of the file system for a regular expression. Every string that matches the regular expression can be replaced with a replace string. One console-based version of this application has no GUI, making it suitable for use in a script or batch file. The second version is a user- friendly version that provides a user interface. The two versions are:
  • SR - Batch-mode Search and Replace
  • GSR - GUI-mode Search and Replace

Put note on Regular expressions here...

No other applications are currently implemented
